title: Foundation Building - Week 1
subtitle: Starting your movement journey with gentle introduction
videoDescription: This video introduces the fundamentals of building a sustainable movement practice. Watch to learn proper form and understand the importance of consistency.
description: Welcome to your movement journey! This first module focuses on building a sustainable foundation. We'll start with gentle 15-minute walks and basic mobility work to establish healthy habits that will last a lifetime.
activities: Step counting setup and daily tracking
Movement habit logging in your journal
keyPoints: Consistency matters more than intensity at this stage
Start where you are - no judgment
Walking is one of the most effective exercises
Track your progress to stay motivated
